{{Wired embedded system |brand=Thecus |model=N4350 |revision=(v0.2) |upc=884956004035 |asin=B071XCTJ3V |newegg=2WG-00G6-00001 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |price=270 |est_release_date=06/2017 |type=NAS enclosure |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.5 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6828 |cpu1_cspeed=1.8 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=512 |fla1_brand=SK hynix |fla1_model=H27U4G8F2DTR-BC |fla2=4 |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX25L3206EM2I-12G |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H5AN4G6NAFR-UHC |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, USB 3.0, SATA 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=3 |expansion_sata_num=4 |jtag=yes,, 20-pin header,, unpopulated,, J2 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, J1 |eth_cpu=yes |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1512 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=USB 3.1 Gen 1 Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL3523;;1;,,, 512Kb SPI NOR Flash;Macronix;MX25L512EMI-10G;;1;,,, 16-bit I2C-bus LED dimmer;Phillips;PCA9532PW;;1;,,, Digital Temperature Sensor and Thermal Watchdog;TI;LM75B;;1;,,, 5A, 18V, 650kHz Synchronous Step-Down Converter;RIchtek;RT6206A;;2;,,, Precision Programmable Reference;TI;TL431;;1;,,, 2-Channel SPDT Bidirectional Analog Switch Dual-Channel 2:1 Multiplexer and Demultiplexer;TI;TS3A24159;;1;,,, Single Positive-Edge-Triggered D-Type Flip-Flop w/Clear and Preset;TI;SN74LVC1G74;;1;,,, 3A, 50V PNP Low VCEsat Transistor;Nexperia;PBSS5350Z;;1;,,, 2A, 20V PNP Medium Power Transistor;Nexperia;BCP69;;1;,,, 30V, 35A P-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega;AON7401;;1;,,, Hex Schmitt-Trigger Inverter;TI;SN74LVC14A;;1;, |flags=RTC w/ battery, power switch, buzzer, fan, heatsink, metal case |stock_boot=U-Boot;2013.01;Marvell v.2015 T1.0p18; |stock_os=ThecusOS 7.0 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui_eth=BC:5C:4C }} {{TagLine|4-Bay Smart Home NAS (N4350)}} :[https://www.thecus.com/index-product?language_num=1&PROD_ID=137 Product page]
"N4350_MB Ver:0.2" is silkscreened on the board. :OUI: BC:5C:4C ([[Elecom]])
{{See also|List of NAS Devices}}
===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/nas/nas-reviews/thecus-n4350-four-bay-soho-nas-reviewed/ ''Thecus N4350 Four-Bay SOHO NAS'' on '''StorageReview'''] *[https://www.kitguru.net/professional/networking/simon-crisp/thecus-n4350-4-bay-nas/all/1/ ''Thecus N4350 4-Bay NAS'' on '''KitGuru''']
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6828 (''Armada 388'') :Dual Core ARM (Cortex-A9) @1.8GHz *Storage: 4MB (SPI NOR), 512MB (NAND) Flash, 4x SATA *Memory: 1GB (DDR4) SDRAM *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *USB: 1x USB 2.0 (internal only), 2x USB 3.0 ports *Power: 12V/5A via barrel
==Images== <gallery> File:Thecus N4350 Top.jpeg|Main Board Top File:Thecus N4350 Bottom.jpeg|Main Board Bottom File:Thecus N4350 SATA Top.jpeg|SATA Board Top File:Thecus N4350 SATA Bottom.jpeg|SATA Board Bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
